title: Emerald Radiance Diamond Haaram Set
materials: Freshwater Pearls. Features a fine Hyderabadi polish for lasting shine.
features: A stunning statement necklace featuring a floral motif intricately set with dazzling diamonds. The central pendant is adorned with a captivating Zambian Emerald, surrounded by delicate diamond work. Pearl drops enhance the elegance. The design incorporates traditional South Indian floral patterns, providing a modern take on the classic Haaram style. The graduated layers offer depth and dimension.
occasions: and special occasions like Seemantham (శ్రీమంతం) or half-saree functions. A timeless piece for making a lasting impression.
description: This exquisite Diamond Haaram combines the opulence of diamonds with the traditional charm of South Indian jewelry. The carefully selected Emeralds add a touch of regal sophistication, believed to bring prosperity and good fortune. Meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, this piece is a true investment in timeless beauty and cultural heritage. Its versatile design makes it suitable for both traditional and contemporary attire.
